item.title: The Matrix Resurrections: New Morpheus, Explained (& What Laurence Fishburne Thought About His Replacement)
item.description: Morpheus was famously played by Laurence Fishburne in The Matrix trilogy but the actor was replaced in the 2024 sequel, The Matrix Resurrections.

item.title: 1998 Cult Classic Horror Movie Getting A Remake With Robert Rodriguez As Producer
item.description: Robert Rodrguez's cult 1998 sci-fi horror classic is due to receive a remake, and The Desperado director will serve as a producer on the film.

item.title: Jurassic World: Rebirth Can Finally Adapt The Spectacular Scene Cut From 1993's Original Movie
item.description: The news that Jurassic World: Rebirth has room for some missing Jurassic Park scenes bodes well for one iconic lost set piece from Spielberg's movie.
